description:
Clearpoint is a national nonprofit, mission-driven organization with over 50 years of experience providing personalized financial counseling and education to consumers by phone or online, and in person. Our counselors help people gain a full perspective of their financial situation, identify their goals and make a plan to achieve them. 

Clearpoint is a member agency of the National Foundation for Credit Counseling (NFCC) and a system-wide accredited business with the Better Business Bureau. All counselors are NFCC certified and approved by the U.S. Department of Housing and Urban Development. 

Our Services: 
* Budget and Credit Counseling
* Debt Management Program
* Pre-purchase Housing Counseling
* Foreclosure Prevention
* Reverse Mortgage Help
* Bankruptcy Education
* Student Loan Counseling
name: CLEARPOINT CREDIT COUNSELING SOLUTIONS
